description: run.bat: make windows runtime test timeout same as other os

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM. Thank you

On Tue, Apr 9, 2013 at 12:57 PM,  <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> run.bat: make windows runtime test timeout same as other os
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.com/8551043/
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/run.bat
>
>
> Index: src/run.bat
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/run.bat
> +++ b/src/run.bat
> @@ -43,7 +43,7 @@
>  echo.
>
>  echo # runtime -cpu=1,2,4
> -go test runtime -short -timeout=120s -cpu=1,2,4
> +go test runtime -short -timeout=240s -cpu=1,2,4
>  if errorlevel 1 goto fail
>  echo.
>
>
>
